cbml:panel.note: A Death Crab Super Badnik is seen leaving a forest, tearing down trees in its wake as it heads toward a river. Sonic is seen as a blur blur, launching off a cliff towards the robot.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Not a bad race, big guy! But there's no way I'm letting you trample that town!
cbml:panel.note: As the Death Crab enters the river, Sonic sprints across the water's surface, his legs a red blur. The Death Crap attempts to swat him with a claw.
Sonic dashes up the leg of the Death Crab, a determined look on his face.
Bouncing ooff the Crab's spikes, Sonic climbs up its leg.
Sonic glides down towards the Crab's face.
Sonic lands in a sprinter's pose, with both hands on the ground, lunging forward.
Sonic rolls into a ball, spinning in place and kicking up a large cloud of dust.
Sonic slams into the Death Crab's face, cracking its surface. The Crab's head begins exploding.
Sonic leaps off the Death Crab as it explodes, leaving sonic booms in his wake.
Sonic lands on the Death Crab's outstretched arm.
Sonic launches off the Crab's limb, warping its surface with his force as he flies into the sky.
As Sonic leaps high into the air, the Death Crab begins to buckle. On the ground, some villagers watch or run in terror.
Sonic flies into the top of the Death Crab's head, inciting a massive explosion.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Ta-Dahhhh! ♫
That was so cool!
I thought we were goners!
How do you move like that?!/cbml:balloon>
Thank you, thank you.
cbml:panel.note: The villagers crowd around Sonic, leaping excitedly. Sonic stands smugly.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Look out!
cbml:panel.note: The villagers start running away. One points behind Sonic, who looks shocked as he turns around.
The Death Crab reaches forward with one claw, its eye glinting menacingly. Sonic begins to turn around, smiling.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Hyah!
cbml:panel.note: Amy Rose appears, smashing the Death Crab with her Piko Piko Hammer. Sonic is wowed by this.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: You're getting sloppy, Sonic.
A-Amy. Fancy meeting you here.
cbml:panel.note: Amy wags her finger at Sonic, chastising him. Sonic looks vaguely annoyed.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I heard about what you and Tails did in the neighboring town and hurried over! I just knew you'd stop by here!
cbml:panel.note: Amy laughs while kneading her face with one hand, blushing.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Huh. Word travels fast...
cbml:panel.note: Sonic looks to the side nonchalantly.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: ...Ah, nevermind. Looks like things are under control here. Thanks for the save! Laters!
Sonic-Wait! I came out here specifically to find you!
cbml:panel.note: Sonic grumpily stalks away from the fallen Death Crab. Amy reaches after him.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I know. It's kinda your thing.

Not like that!
I mean, I'm always happy to see you. And would follow you anywhere if you'd only let me but-
-OOH! You get me so flustered!
cbml:panel.note: Sonic points at Amy, who pouts while blushing.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Sonic-I need you to come back to the resistance.
Come back? I thought you all were doing clean-up not that the war is over?
cbml:panel.note: Amy grabs Sonic hands. Sonic looks at her confusedly.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
That was the plan, but we didn't account for just how large the Eggman Empire's army was.
The leftover robots are everywhere. Even without Eggman to lead them, they're a constant threat, randomly attacking anyone they find.
cbml:panel.note: Amy looks off to the side, a worried look on her face.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: The Resistance is working to finish the fight. By working from a centralized, organized position, we can be way more effective.
cbml:panel.note: Sonic stands with his arms crossed. Amy leans on her hammer pensively.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Nah, pass.
Oh, for the love of - Why?!
cbml:panel.note: Amy shouts angrily as Sonic walks away unconcerdedly.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
Tails pointed out something that's been bugging me. The last group of Badniks we faced was way more organized.
But Eggman hasn't shown up t oclaim responsibility. Subtly is not his forte.
cbml:panel.note: Sonic gestures explainedly as he recalls when he and Tails met in Vista View.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: And now you just happen to hear about where I am, right in time for another Super Badnik to attack where we're both likely to be?
Yikes...I hadn't thought of that.
cbml:panel.note: Sonic gestures towards the fallen Death Crab. Amy leans forward, interested.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Then it's all the more reason for you to come back to the Resistance!
No, it's all the more reason for me to hit the road and find out what's going on!
cbml:panel.note: Amy shouts frustratedly, while Sonic mimes walking away.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: You could spend weeks - or months - bouncing around settlements looking for clues!
Saving more folks from more Badnik attacks. It's win-win for everyone!
cbml:panel.note: Amy sighs while Sonic slams his hands together.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Sonic! Ms. Rose! Emergency! We're under attack. *GASP*
cbml:panel.note: Lanoling rushes forward, out of breath, surprising Amy and Sonic.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: It's cool. We took out the Super Badnik.
*PANT* No! I mean an army! Invading from the West!
cbml:panel.note: Sonic smiles confidently, but Lanolin appears distressed.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: The crab-bot was a decoy...
We've got to stop the invasion before the city is over-run!
cbml:panel.note: Sonic and Amy look at each other, ready for action.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I'll run ahead and thin them out!
Do you have any kind of defenses?
We turned Town Hall into a bunker of sorts during the war...
Take me there!
cbml:panel.note: Sonic runs ahead. Amy runs beside Lanolin, behind him.
Sonic dashes towards aome invading Egg Walkers resembling birds.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Get all the unarmed inside! If you can fight, rally to me!
cbml:panel.note: Amy directs the villagers towards the Town Hall. A yellow rabbit, fox, and white sheep run indoors.
Sonic runs along a wall while the Egg Walkers fire missiles at them.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Get to the upper floors! Don't fire until the Badniks have entered the square!
cbml:panel.note: Amy grabs a brown bird and points behind them. A red fox stands behind Amy, wielding two guns.
Sonic dashes between the Egg Walkers, destroying them one after another.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Whoops...
cbml:panel.note: As Sonic lands on the ground after destroying an Egg Walker, more Walkers and Egg Pawns round a nearby corner, catching Sonic in their laser sights.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Not everyone is accounted for!
Pair up! Go door-to-door and bring back no more than 10 at a time! Keep low and check your corners!
cbml:panel.note: A brown fox in a suit and Amy are in a heated discussion.
Sonic bounces between an alley's walls, avoiding bulletfire coming from above and behind him.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Incoming! Get ready!
cbml:panel.note: Amy gestures towards a villager on a nearby roof, holding her hammer behind her head. Worried looking animals gather behind her.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Dang it! I let too many get past me!
cbml:panel.note: Sonic glances angrily through an alley as he runs past it. Egg Pawns and Egg Walkers are seen marching past.
The villagers gathered outside the Town Hall open fire on the approaching Badniks, standing behind barriers or crouching on the rooftop.
Amy swings her hammer forward.
Lanolin, along with others, begins firing at the Egg Pawns from neighboring rooftops.
The Egg Pawns are blown away by the barrage of lasers, firing wildly into the air.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: The first wave is down!
cbml:panel.note: Amy raises her fist in celebration. Sonic brushes his hands together, even though he didn't really do anything.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I thought Knuckles was the commander of the Resistance
Oh, he commanded alright. But who do you think kept things organized?
cbml:panel.note: Sonic crosses his arms, smiling. Amy does a sarcastic shrugging motion.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
Nice
So what's the plan?
This is a good defensible position, and the militia is placed well, but...
cbml:panel.note: Sonic and Amy stand in front of the damaged Town Hall. Militia members stand on the roof and behind barriers. The field in front of the Town Hall is littered with broken Badnik bodies.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Too many Badniks?
Too many Badniks. We'll be overrun. We need to find where they're coming from and thin their advance so the villagers can stand a chance.
cbml:panel.note: Sonic furrows his brow. Amy looks down determinedly.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Shall we?
Let's!
cbml:panel.note: Sonic reaches out his hand, and Amy smiles and begins to take it.
Sonic and Amy barrel through a crowd of Badniks in an alleyway, appearing as a pink and blue blur.
Sonic runs ahead, dragging Amy by her hand. Amy destroys passing Badniks with her Piko Piko Hammer.
Sonic throws Amy into the air, and she spins like a top.
Amy destroys a ring of Egg Pawns with a single spin of her hammer, a vindictive smile on her face.
Sonic catches amy in his arms. Amy is very happy about this.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Whee! Isn't this fun?
cbml:panel.note: Sonic throws Amy into the air, who readies a swing while looking back at him. Bullets are fired at Sonic from all directions, and a missile is flying right at Amy.
Amy spikes a missile downwards with her hammer, causing a massive explosion and destroying the Badniks below.
Amy lands on the groundnext to Sonic, who taps his foot impatiently.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Y'know - you could do this sort of thing all the time with the Resistance.
cbml:panel.note: Amy smiles at Sonic, fluttering her eyelashes. Sonic looks frankly, disgusted.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Nope.
cbml:panel.note: Sonic turns to run away. Amy looks exasperated.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I already told you what I'm gonna do!
cbml:panel.note: Sonic vaults over an Egg Walker, directing its fire breath towards the Egg Pan behind him.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: You didn't even consider coming back!
cbml:panel.note: Amy crushes an Egg Walker's head with her hammer while looking to the side surprisedly.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I don't need to!
cbml:panel.note: Sonic runs straight up a wall, an angry tic-mark appearing on his forehead.
Sonic leaps down and smashes into the ground, creating a shockwave tha knocks back the nearby Egg Pawns.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I already know what works best for me.
Well, what about what worls best for the rest of us?
cbml:panel.note: Sonic brushes himself off. Amy smashes an Egg Pawn's head.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
I'm no good at figuring that stuff out. You are. So you do your thing, I'll do mine.
Behind you.
If you won't do it for the resistance, do it for me?
cbml:panel.note: Sonic shrugs. An Egg Walker approaches Amy from behind.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Can't play favorites.

HNG! Then do it for your friends?!
Egg Pawns closing in. Thirty feet.
cbml:panel.note: Sonic raises one of his fingers, a hand on his hip. Amy swings behind her without looking, knocking away the Egg Walker.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: They've got you, remember?
Do it for a chili-dog?!
Ooh! Now you're talking!
cbml:panel.note: Sonic runs away, winking. Amy yells after him.
Sonic dashes straight into an Egg Pawn, warping the air around him.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Yo! Enemy drop ship just outside the village. Looks like it still has plenty aboard.
That's not good!
cbml:panel.note: Sonic and ay aome to the top of a set of stairs. Sonic looks into the distance.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: There's no way we can get through that crowd.
Conventionally? No.
cbml:panel.note: In the distance, a Blowfish Transporter hovvers above the ground, dropping a crowd of Egg Pawns.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I think it's time for a Croquette Bomber.
From this distance? You are a daredevil.
cbml:panel.note: Sonic grins sneakily. Amy gives him the sideeye.
Sonic revs in place as Amy preps a hammer swing behind him.
Amy launches Sonic towards the Blowfish Transporter with a swing of her Piko Piko Hammer.
As the Blowfish Transporter explodes in the distance, Amy shields her eyes.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Are you okay?!
HA! HA! HA! You knocked me right onto the power cell! What a shot!
cbml:panel.note: Sonic is left burned to a crisp on the ground. Amy runs toward him.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: That's it for the invasion. I guess... You'll be going then...
Yep!
cbml:panel.note: Sonic stretches as Amy looks down bashfully.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon:
It's what I do. Just keep moving, doing good, saving folks, and living as free as the wind.
Living by my way. My own way.
cbml:panel.note: Sonic stands in an epic pose, stylistically shadowed by the setting sun.
Amy blushes profusely.
Amy shakes her head vigorously.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: ...A-Amy?
You're right.
cbml:panel.note: Sonic cringes. Amy closes her eyes and smiles.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: I am?
It's just who you are - and it's all the reasons I love you. I can't change you. I don't want to change you.
cbml:panel.note: Amy grabs Sonic's hands. He looks surprised, and worried.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Heh...Well...It's not like it's all or nothing. You could come with me.
I can't. The Resistance needs me to keep everything in order. I've been away too long as it is.
cbml:panel.note: Sonic and Amy walk among the Blowfish Transporter's ruins.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: But if you don't mind some direction, Knuckles went to investigate a town to the South. I haven't heard from him, so he might need your help.
Aye-aye, Cap'n Commander Rose, ma'am.
Don't make me slap you.
cbml:panel.note: Sonic salutes Amy, who sighs exasperatedly.

cbml:panel.cbml:caption: "Another failure. I did not account for how much Amy Rose has grown."
cbml:panel.note: Sonic dashes away, throwing one last wave back to Amy, who waves back, grinning. An Egg Flapper lurks in the background.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: And now Sonic is deviating from my projected path. How... Frustrating.
On the bright side, Bodd, here's what he's charging headlong towards.
cbml:panel.note: A hidden figure sits on a chair emblazoned with Dr. Eggman's symbol. Cubot and Orbot stand behind the chair, Orbot holding a tablet.

cbml:panel.cbml:balloon: Ahh... Perhaps they will finish him for me...
cbml:panel.note: Orbot reveals the tablet, showing the skunk brothers, Rough and Tumble. Cubot looks very distressed, for a robot.

div.p: Sonic is in blue and gold lettering, Letters Squad in white, all on a red backdropSonic Letters Squad

Hello Sonic fans! Hope you enjoed the second issue of Sonic the Hedgehog from IDW Publishing! This time the blue blur and Amy kicked those badniks' ro-butts with the help of Ian Flynn, Adam Bryce Thomas, and Corey Breen! Give big ups to those guys for such a fun issue!
Now, we asked and you delivered, so here are some letters, fan art, and cosplay from you lovely people!
And there's the star of this month's issue, Amy Rose! Nice job, Micheal!

figure.figDesc: Cute fanart of Amy Rose holding her Piko Piko Hammer.

div.p: Art by Michael Carville (DatMichaelGuy)

Hey Sonic crew!
I don't have much to say, other than wanting to tell you that I'm TOTALLY STOKED. Sonic was my first comic book, and I'll be collecting this new series for as long as it runs.
I've been trying to get a letter published in a Sonic comic since I was 8 - and now, at 31, I work at a comic book stare and have been actively pushing the IDW Sonic on anyone who'll listen. Full circle, huh?
At the risk of sounding cliche, the new Sonic can't get here fast enough!
Aaron Kurtzer
Sonic Fan #1
(If I establish this out of the gate, no one can challenge me on it, right?)

figure.figDesc: Fanart of various characters from Sonic Forces, like the player Avatar and Infinite.

div.p: Art by JacobVatnhamar (JamoART)
Thanks, Aaron! We're very happy to help you finally get a letter of yours in a Sonic comic and to hear that you're

doing good work at a comic shop! We've heard from a lot of people that Sonic was their very first comic and that it inspired a life-long love of the medium and I'm glad you're getting to introduce people to Sonic now and continue that cycle!

figure.figDesc: Black pen fanart of Sonic in various cartoon poses.

div.p: Art by Evangelos Vikopoulos

Good afternoon guys,
My name is Matias "Silver" Kock, I'm from Argentina and a fan of Sonic The Hedgehog since I was little. In Argentina, I am recognize along with my girlfriend Rena Rose for performing pairs or teams with friends of the Sonic saga. We both belong to the fanpage called "Sonc Team Argentina", a very important fanclub hat brings together the Sonic fans of our country.
I hope you like our work as well as us in doing it for all who love this saga.
I wish you the best of luck and wishes with the new Sonic Comcs. Greetings from Argentina.
Best Wishes,
Matias "Silver" Koch

Thanks Matias! Looks like you have a great group there in Argentina! And I recognize that Amy, it's Rena from our first issue! Hope you guyes are having lots of fun!
